bill.title: Mississippi Workforce Development Act; create.
bill.description: An Act To Create The Mississippi Workforce Development Act; To Provide Definitions; To Establish The Coordinating Council For Workforce Development; To Develop A Comprehensive Plan For Workforce Training And Education Under The Coordinating Council For Workforce Development; To Provide Legislative Findings; To Establish The Duties Of The Council; To Establish To Whom The Comprehensive Plan Must Be Submitted And The Contents Required; To Provide For Program Evaluations; To Provide For A Biennial Assessment By The Council; To Provide That The Council Shall Improve Coordination Of Workforce Development In The State; To Provide For The Creation Of A State Strategic Plan For Supply Of Health Care Personnel; To Provide That The Workforce Development Councils Shall Develop And Maintain A Local Unified Plan For The Workforce Development System; To Bring Forward Sections 7-1-355, 37-151-75, 37-153-3, 37-153-5, 37-153-7, 37-153-9, 37-153-11, 37-153-13, 41-123-1, 41-123-3, 43-1-30, 43-17-5, 57-1-401, 57-1-451, 57-10-707, 57-62-5, 57-75-5, 57-107-3, 57-113-21, 69-2-5, 71-5-11, 71-5-353, 73-15-18, 7-1-351, 7-1-357, 7-1-361, 7-1-363, 7-1-365, 7-1-371, 37-31-69, 75-60-45 And 37-16-17, Mississippi Code Of 1972, For The Purpose Of Possible Amendment; And For Related Purposes.
